channel.title: Help with getting a client to load
channel.description:
**When ever i download a client and run it, it says java is not recognized.**
These are the things I've tried to do. -Downloaded java from java.com
I think i know the problem can somebody send me CLASSPATH and PATH codes, and were to get the jdk that goes with it please. Would be very much appreciated.

item.title: Help with getting a client to load
item.dc:creator: @Tredog Tredog
item.description:
@Tredog wrote:

I haven’t played in like 7 months i think i need a new jdk

Read full topic
item.source: Help with getting a client to load
